name: Nerds on Site
overview:
Our team of nerds has been working with small-medium sized enterprises for 16 years now – over that time we have grown a team of experts, and a wide range of solutions that deliver results that matter to small and medium sized enterprises:

-Saving time -Saving money -Increasing productivity -Reducing crashes and costly downtime -Maintaining or gaining leading edge status in the marketplace -We are focused on helping our clients eliminate the pain often -Associated with technology!

Whether you need a network that just works, reliable and cost effective phone systems, security solutions, mobile workforce capabilities or more – we can help.
